message.content:
Ọ bụrụ na ị chọrọ ike ịnweta njikọ maka ịmepụta malware na ịntanetị, nkekọrịta site na-eji ịmepụta malware dịka antivirus software.

Nke a bụ, nwere ike ịnweta antivirus software nwere ike ịmepụta malware na kọmputa gị. Iji nyere ya na-akpọ nke a:

1. Gaa na ịntanetị na kọmputa gị.
2. Hazi ngwa a na-akpọ antivirus software nwere ike ịmepụta malware. N'ime ihe nkiri a, gụọ "antivirus software" na-ewuwa gị n'ime aha Igbo ma ọ bụ ma-akpọ ihe ndị na-agụnye.

    - Dịka antivirus software eji anya, jiri "Avast" ma ọ bụ "Norton" ma ọ bụ "Kaspersky."
    - Dịka antivirus software eji aka, jiri "Malwarebytes" ma ọ bụ "Bitdefender."

3. Site nke a na-akpọtụ na kọmputa gị. Maka ihe dị ka "Avast," gaa na https://www.avast.com/ig-ww/index#pc, ma ọ bụ maka "Malwarebytes," gaa na https://www.malwarebytes.com/ig/.

4. Gaa n'akụkọ ịkwụsị software na-akpọtụ. Gaa n'akụkọ a na-akpọtụ na ịntanetị nke ịrịba gị.

5. Echiche ka gị ka-akpọtụ software. Lelee na ihe ngwá ọ bụla dị ka echiche na-akpọtụ.

6. Gaa n'akụkọ ịkwụsị software ma ọ bụrụ na-akpọtụ n'ime ihe ọhụrụ. Ihe ịnwere ike
